Guy spins while making a handstand with his legs outstretched. It creates enough wind to clear a small area of thick mist.

== Trivia ==
* Tsumujikaze is another way to read the word {{translation|"whirlwind"|旋風|senpū}}, technically making this and [[Leaf Whirlwind]] have the same name, though with different pronunciations.
